2019 was a great year for Docusaurus - we've made tremendous progress on [Docusaurus 2](https://docusaurus.io/). Current Docusaurus 1 users who aren't using the translations feature can feel free to check it out and [migrate](https://docusaurus.io/docs/migration) to it! Otherwise we will work with you to make that happen in 2020 :)

translations.zh-CN: 2019年对Docusaurus而言是硕果累累的一年——我们在[Docusaurus 2](https://docusaurus.io/)上取得了重大进展。当前未使用翻译功能的Docusaurus 1用户可以随时试用并[迁移](https://docusaurus.io/docs/migration)至新版本！否则我们将在2020年协助您完成迁移 :)

segments.source_content: <!--truncate-->
## Docusaurus 2 (D2)

In 2018, we proposed to rebuild [Docusaurus from the ground up](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/789). It involved a major rearchitecture effort - we created a content-centric CSS framework from scratch, a plugins system, and moved from static HTML pages to be a single page-app with prerendered routes. It was a wild adventure and a tough feat, especially with no dedicated FTE working on the project. With the help of [@endilie](https://github.com/endiliey), our ex-intern-turned-contributor-turned-maintainer, we made really good progress on D2 and are currently on version 2.0.0-alpha.40. All features in Docusaurus 1 except for translations have been ported over.

translations.zh-CN: 2018年，我们提出了[彻底重构Docusaurus](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/789)的计划。这项工作涉及重大架构调整——我们从零开始构建了以内容为核心的CSS框架、插件系统，并将静态HTML页面转变为具有预渲染路由的单页应用。这是一次疯狂的冒险和艰难的壮举，尤其是在没有专职人员负责该项目的情况下。在从实习生转变为贡献者继而成为维护者的[@endilie](https://github.com/endiliey)的帮助下，我们在D2上取得了显著进展，当前版本为2.0.0-alpha.40。除翻译功能外，Docusaurus 1的所有特性均已移植到新版本。

segments.source_content: D2's killer features are **Dark Mode** and its **superb performance**. D2 has dark mode support out-of-the-box and it is near effortless to create a dark mode-friendly documentation site. Endilie put in great effort into optimizing the performance of the site and a bunch of performance optimization tricks have been done under the hood by default - optimized images, prerendering every route to static HTML and client-side routing thereafter, prefetching assets needed by future navigations whenever the user hovers over a navigation link, etc.

translations.zh-CN: D2的核心优势是**暗黑模式**和**卓越性能**。D2开箱即支持暗黑模式，几乎无需额外工作即可创建适配暗黑模式的文档站点。Endilie在性能优化方面投入了大量精力，默认实现了多项优化策略——包括图片优化、将所有路由预渲染为静态HTML后启用客户端路由、当用户悬停在导航链接时预加载后续导航所需资源等。

segments.source_content: Last but not least, we implemented a plugins architecture and turned the repo into a [Lerna monorepo](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages). We believe this plugin architecture will be helpful towards building a community and also allowing users to build their own features for their unique use cases.

translations.zh-CN: 最后但同样重要的是，我们实现了插件架构并将代码库改造为[Lerna monorepo](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages)。我们相信这种插件架构将有助于构建社区生态，同时让用户能为特定用例开发自定义功能。

segments.source_content: ## GitHub Activity

- Stars: 10050 → 14632 (+45.6% y/y)
- Total Contributors: 182 → 303 (+66.4% y/y). Most of which are non-Facebook contributors
- Daily npm Downloads: 728 → 2320 (+218.7% y/y). The peak was in November
- D1 is currently used by 3872 projects on GitHub while D2 is used by 247 projects on GitHub
- We now have 4 active core contributors! (+100% y/y)

translations.zh-CN:
- 星标数：10050 → 14632（同比增长45.6%）
- 总贡献者：182 → 303（同比增长66.4%），其中大部分为非Facebook贡献者
- 日均npm下载量：728 → 2320（同比增长218.7%），峰值出现在11月
- GitHub上目前有3872个项目使用D1，247个项目使用D2
- 活跃核心贡献者增至4人！（同比增长100%）

segments.source_content: ## Notable Users
A good portion of the projects within the Open Source community use Docusaurus. This half we also onboarded more notable projects onto Docusaurus 2:

translations.zh-CN: 开源社区中大量项目采用Docusaurus。过去半年我们还成功让更多知名项目迁移至Docusaurus 2：

segments.source_content:
- [Create React App](https://create-react-app.dev/)
- [Redux](https://redux.js.org/)
- [Draft.js](https://draftjs.org/)
- [Flux](http://facebook.github.io/flux/)
And welcomed more projects to Docusaurus 1:

translations.zh-CN: 同时欢迎更多项目加入Docusaurus 1阵营：

segments.source_content:
- [Libra](https://developers.libra.org/)
- [MobX](https://mobx.js.org/)
- [Immer](https://immerjs.github.io/immer/)
- [Sorbet](https://sorbet.org/)
## Media
Yangshun gave a classroom session during F8 about [Using Docusaurus to Create Open Source Websites](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QcGJsf6mgZE).

translations.zh-CN: Yangshun在F8大会上进行了主题为[使用Docusaurus创建开源网站](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QcGJsf6mgZE)的教学演讲。

segments.source_content: ## Community
A few third-party hosting/development services also has first-class integration with a Docusaurus setup:

translations.zh-CN: 部分第三方托管/开发服务已实现对Docusaurus的一键式集成：

segments.source_content:
- [Vercel deployment](https://github.com/vercel/vercel/tree/main/examples/docusaurus)
- [CodeSandbox](https://codesandbox.io/s/docusaurus-template-x3vg9)
- [Render](https://render.com/docs/deploy-docusaurus)
## Looking Ahead

D2 has gained some traction among the [developer community](https://docusaurus.io/showcase). In 2020, we want to achieve full feature parity with D1 by the first half and help the remaining Facebook projects on D1 move to D2. It would also be great if we could use Docusaurus for internal documentation, but that is a non-trivial undertaking. If you have a need for it or have some ideas, come speak with us!

translations.zh-CN: D2 已在[开发者社区](https://docusaurus.io/showcase)中取得一定影响力。2020年，我们的目标是在上半年实现与D1的完整功能对等，并协助剩余的Facebook项目从D1迁移至D2。若能实现将Docusaurus用于内部文档系统也将意义重大，但这绝非易事。若您有此需求或相关构想，欢迎与我们交流！

segments.source_content: Huge thanks to the community for their contributions, especially the core team - [Endilie Yacop Sucipto](https://github.com/endiliey), [Alexey Pyltsyn](https://github.com/lex111), [Wei Gao](https://github.com/wgao19). Lastly, thank you [Joel Marcey](https://github.com/JoelMarcey) for starting Docusaurus and supporting the project all this time.

translations.zh-CN: 衷心感谢社区的贡献，特别是核心团队成员——[Endilie Yacop Sucipto](https://github.com/endiliey)、[Alexey Pyltsyn](https://github.com/lex111)、[Wei Gao](https://github.com/wgao19)。最后，感谢[Docusaurus创始人Joel Marcey](https://github.com/JoelMarcey)长期以来的支持。

segments.source_content: Cheers to a great 2020! 🎉
